Blog.post: why must rain! why? haiyo... todae soccer training was postpone! omg..... actually todae is a unlucky dae! my fren hp drop sia then ball fall out of the road and then almost got it! lolz..... he always nv take care... since he we nv go then we go for lunch... the same beef noodles.... so nice man!! hahaxx... tml got band and basson come already! omg i wish i can play but i cant! lolz... i really wan to play man! hope tml i can be the one lor! so take care and see ya tml!

cool... todae nothing special... juz like the same lor... actually got concert to see de... but some ppl onli so nv go... haiz..... then tml got school and have soccer practice... hahaxx... cool rite? hahaxx... okok, gtg soon le... have to slp so take care everyone!

todae is a cool and nice dae... my frens are all good to me and i really like it... but actually we got go for soccer practice one but because some frens have to go so no choice! a nice food and fun fair dae with lots of food and games... especially my stall's items... all my frens are so cooperative... i am so glad hope that there will be next time... tml gonna go for a concert and will be a cool dae... hahaxx... English Permier League is starting soon... chelsea rulez! man united rulez too!! hahaax... ok... tml lets see still got wad fun thing... take care everyone!

haiz... another bad dae for me... all my friends abandon me.... wad is happening? am i really that bad? am i? haiz... wanna ask them but they don wanna sae... i am so sad! can anyone help?ok.... tml is our school food and fun fair and its gonna be a fun dae again... so i hope that they wont abandon me again... but i am really thankful that i have them to be my frens... they are good frens... god! please bless me! please!

Am i really a bad friend? Am i? Haiz... I really dunnoe wad to do... Yu cong ar, i treat you as a very good friend but you treat me like shit... I am so disappointed... anything uyou not happy with can just tell me de... ok? i still want to be friends with you playing soccer, watching soccer, talking about soccer... please write me a massage k? friends forever... todae i oso got band... so less people, should not go sia... hahaxx... me really love band... and tomorrow is a long dae, so god bless me!

Thank you for brownsing through my blog. I am a crazy football fan of Chelsea, France and of course, Portugal. To me, footbal is a dream. After ever goal, there will be thoughts on what made it a goal. Althought football is not everything to me, but i will love football for life.
